Detailed Description

template<typename T, const unsigned int D>
struct feature_vector< T, D >

Template for D-dimensional feature vectors.

Encapsulates a D-dimensional array with an extra entry of the same type for the class label. Has been compared to the direct use of arrays with no change in efficiency.

Template Parameters:
TData type of the elements in the vector.
DNumber of dimensions of the vector.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T , const unsigned int D>
T feature_vector< T, D >::distance_to ( const feature_vector< T, D > &  p) const [inline]

Squared distance to a point.

Generic squared euclidean distance operator for two D-dimensional numeric kd_points. Redefinitions and specializations of this operator are welcome.

Parameters:
pPoint being compared to.
Returns:
Euclidean squared distance between the two kd_points.
template<>
float feature_vector< float, 24U >::distance_to ( const feature_vector< float, 24U > &  p) const

SSE-accelerated squared euclidean distance operator for two 24-dimensional single precision kd_points.

Warning:
All feature vectors must be allocated aligned to 16 bytes.
Parameters:
pPoint being compared to.
Returns:
Euclidean squared distance between the two kd_points.
template<>
float feature_vector< float, 24U >::distance_to ( const feature_vector< float, 24U > &  p,
float  upper 
) const

SSE-accelerated squared euclidean distance operator for two 24-dimensional single precision kd_points. Special version with early leaving in case an upper bound value is reached.

Warning:
All feature vectors must be allocated aligned to 16 bytes.
Parameters:
pPoint being compared to.
upperUpper bound for the distance. Will return immediatly if reached.
Returns:
Euclidean squared distance between the two kd_points or a partial result greater or equal than upper.
template<typename T , const unsigned int D>
T feature_vector< T, D >::distance_to ( const feature_vector< T, D > &  p,
T  upper_bound 
) const [inline]

Squared distance to a point with an upper bound.

Generic squared euclidean distance operator for two D-dimensional numeric kd_points. Special version with early leaving in case an upper bound value is reached.

Parameters:
pPoint being compared to.
upper_boundUpper bound for the distance. Will return immediatly if reached.
Returns:
Euclidean squared distance between the two kd_points or a partial result greater or equal than upper.
template<typename T , const unsigned int D>
void feature_vector< T, D >::operator delete[] ( void *  p)

Standard deallocation for arrays of feature vectors.

Generic memory deallocator operator for feature vector arrays. Defined as complement of operator new [] so that memory-aligned specializations can be defined if required.

Parameters:
pPointer to the address to release.
template<>
void * feature_vector< float, 24U >::operator new[] ( size_t  size)

Memory-aligned version of the memory allocation operator for feature vectors. Ensures the 16-byte alignment required by the SSE instructions.

Parameters:
sizeTotal size in bytes of the objects to allocate.
Returns:
Address to the new allocated memory.
template<typename T , const unsigned int D>
void * feature_vector< T, D >::operator new[] ( size_t  size)

Standard allocation for arrays of feature vectors.

Generic memory allocator operator for feature vector arrays. Defined so that memory-aligned specializations can be defined if required.

Parameters:
sizeTotal size in bytes of the objects to allocate.
Returns:
Address to the new allocated memory.
